Class AlbumEditActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      view.AlbumEditActivity

public class AlbumEditActivity
extends Activity

Author:
J-Tesseract Album Editing Activity (Displays the album name and allows you to change it, delete the album, or do nothing)

 void onClick(View v)

 void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
          On Create Loads the layout of the album_edit Sets the on click listener for the buttons available deleteButton allows the user to delete an album backToAlbumButton returns the user to the list of albums (main.xml) and doneButton allows the user to save any changes made to the album name addAlarmButton allows the user to set up an alarm for this album
 void onPause()
          onPause On pause saves current object using the controller

          setAlarmFrequency Set the frequency of the alarm repetition
private  void setAlarmStartDay()
          setAlarmStartDay Set the day of the week to start the alarm and call setAlarmStartTime
private  void setAlarmStartTime()
          setAlarmStartTime Set The time of the day to start the alarm and call setAlarmFrequency
private  void startAlarm()
          setAlarm Set an alarm specific to this album to go off at a specific time and frequency

Method Detail

onCreate

public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
On Create Loads the layout of the album_edit Sets the on click listener for the buttons available deleteButton allows the user to delete an album backToAlbumButton returns the user to the list of albums (main.xml) and doneButton allows the user to save any changes made to the album name addAlarmButton allows the user to set up an alarm for this album

onPause On pause saves current object using the controller

sendNotification Sends a status bar notification to remind the user

getInitialDelaySeconds

private int getInitialDelaySeconds(int day,
                                   int hour,
                                   int min)
getInitialDelaySeconds Calculate the number of seconds to delay from the current time to initial notification

Parameters:
day - The day of the week to start the initial notification
hour - The hour to start the initial notification
min - The min to start the initial notification
Returns:
delaySeconds The number of seconds to delay between current time and

getRepeatedDelaySeconds

private int getRepeatedDelaySeconds(int week,
                                    int day,
                                    int hour)
getRepeatedDelaySeconds Convert the week, day, or hour into seconds

Parameters:
week - The number of weeks to convert to seconds
day - The number of days to convert to seconds
hour - The number of hours to convert to seconds
Returns:
delaySeconds The number of seconds to delay before repetition

setAlarmStartDay

private void setAlarmStartDay()
setAlarmStartDay Set the day of the week to start the alarm and call setAlarmStartTime

setAlarmStartTime Set The time of the day to start the alarm and call setAlarmFrequency
